title: Was the theory that the Lost Colony of Roanoke assimilated with the nearby Native American tribe a popular theory before the last decade? - Quora
tags: History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Howdy…At one time there was a story of family names in one County (NC?) that matched the names from Roanoke. Stories have circulated since the 1590s as to where they went. 1939(?) Virginia Dare stones…now at Breanu University made the news via LIFE MAGAZINE. There is an article available at ApalacheResearch.
It was always a leading hypothesis, there was just no evidence to support it.
